      • setMonitor

        public void setMonitor(java.lang.Double diastolicBloodPressure,
                       java.lang.Double systolicBloodPressure,
                       java.lang.Double heartRate,
                       java.lang.Double oxygenLevel,
                       java.lang.Double respiratoryRate)
        setMonitor sets up the monitor parameters for user to see
        Parameters:
        diastolicBloodPressure - the lower bound of blood pressure
        systolicBloodPressure - the upper bound of blood pressure
        heartRate - the heart rate of the patient
        oxygenLevel - the oxygen level of the patient
        respiratoryRate - the respiratory rate of the patient
